May 15-17, 2020  August 14-16, 2019  December 16-18, 2020  March 19-21, 2021  May 14-16, 2021      Red Multisite WordPress   Maintenance windows begin at 8:30am on Tuesdays and last 1-2 minutes. There is no expected downtime during this period, but please be aware that brief interruptions are possible.     Maintenance Calendar   Approved changes to the Maintenance Calendar are reviewed by the Change Advisory Board and scheduled for implementation.   Open Maintenance Calendar           Service Status   Subscribe to the Service Outage email list for notifications: Subscribe     View the current system status availability: System Status        Service Notices        ACCC Maintenance Window: May 15 - 17 Planned Downtime Schedule  Thursday, April 30, 2020          Request Tracker (RT) issues [resolved]  Wednesday, April 29, 2020  Some users may have experienced issues accessing Request Tracker (RT) on Wednesday, April 29, between 2:00pm and 2:35pm. We have identified the problem and restored service. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions,…          Echo360 Lecture Capture issue [resolved]  Tuesday, April 28, 2020  4/28/20, 3:46pm — The Echo360 Lecture Capture issue has been resolved and service is operational. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions, please contact: LTS@uic.edu 4/28/20, 3:09pm — Some users may be experiencing issues…          Zoom Data Center Region Restriction 4/20  Thursday, April 16, 2020  ACCC will be implementing a restriction on data center regions utilized by Zoom meeting traffic to use only United States data centers starting on Monday, April 20, at 10:00am. If you have any…          Authentication Maintenance 4/28  Thursday, April 16, 2020  ACCC will be updating the SSL (security) certificate used for Shibboleth authentication on Tuesday, April 28, from 7:05am to 7:10am. This brief update will require a restart of the service and new authentication…          Gmail delivery delays [resolved]  Wednesday, April 8, 2020  4/8/20, 11:00am — The Gmail issue has been resolved and all delayed email has been delivered. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions, please contact consult@uic.edu or 312-413-0003, option 2. 4/8/20, 9:47am —…          Multiple ACCC Service Issues [resolved]  Friday, April 3, 2020  4/5/20, 4:08pm — All services affected by this weekend’s hardware outage have been fully restored. However, some client virtual machines (VMs) may need to be restarted.
